meanings.definition: A person who follows a vegetarian diet.
meanings.sent1: My friend is a vego and always brings delicious veggie dishes to our potlucks.
meanings.sent2: Many vegos choose not to eat meat for ethical reasons.
meanings.sent3: The vego at the party was excited to try the new plant-based burger.
meanings.sent4: The vego's dedication to a meat-free lifestyle is truly inspiring.
meanings.sent5: Being a vego means enjoying a variety of fruits and vegetables every day.

meanings.definition: The act of following a vegetarian diet.
meanings.sent1: Cooking delicious meals without meat is a key aspect of being a vego.
meanings.sent2: Some people find transitioning to vego challenging but rewarding.
meanings.sent3: The vego of the group always has the best recipes for meatless meals.
meanings.sent4: Choosing to embrace vego can lead to discovering new favorite foods.
meanings.sent5: The vego lifestyle promotes health and sustainability.

meanings.definition: Belonging to or characteristic of vegetarians.
meanings.sent1: The vego restaurant offers a wide selection of plant-based dishes.
meanings.sent2: She always brings vego snacks to share at work.
meanings.sent3: The vego community is growing as more people embrace plant-based diets.
meanings.sent4: His vego lifestyle influences his cooking choices.
meanings.sent5: The vego options at the grocery store are expanding to meet demand.
